sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: You're watching Euronews now. I'm Takumbo Sulako with your top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The West awaits a response from Russia to its security demands as France, Germany, Kiev and Moscow agree to more talks to de-escalate the crisis over Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Is it its secret ballot to elect a head of state goes down to the final round?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: We'll have the latest from Rome.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: head of state goes down to the final round we'll have the latest from Rome and we'll take a look at a new UK exhibition highlighting the work of the British painter Francis Bacon Russian and Ukrainian diplomats have met face to face in Paris in an attempt to find a negotiated

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: solution over the Ukraine crisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The talks were aimed at reviving the 2015 Minsk Protocol that sought to end fighting in the region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's envoy struck an upbeat note.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The parties have stated openly and sincerely that there are differences over the interpretation and execution of the Minsk agreement between Russia and Ukraine, said Andrey Yermak, but there is a willingness to continue working on reducing those differences.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But Russia's representative sounded more cautious about the negotiations, brokered by France and Germany under the so-called Normandy format.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Â«We have all agreed that as long as different interpretations remain over the Minsk agreement and its implementation, the Normandy format will not be able to play a significant role in the contact group and in contributing to the settlement of the conflict in eastern Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Euronews' Galina Polonskaya has been following developments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The nomad-deformat talks between political advisers from Ukraine, Russia, Germany and France in Paris lasted for more than eight hours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The final declaration reaffirms that the Minsk agreements are the basis of this format and underlines support for the unconditional observance of the ceasefire in the east of Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It says that all sides are committed to reducing the current disagreements and are willing to meet again in two weeks in Berlin.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile in Moscow, U.S. Ambassador John Sullivan delivered a rejection of Russia's central demand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Washington says it stands by Ukraine's right to pursue NATO membership.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: More than 20 Russian Navy ships were seen performing military drills in the Black Sea on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Sharing the sea with Ukraine, Russia's defence ministry said that this was only part of a series of training drills.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: On the ground, Russian military footage shows Russian tanks moving towards firing ranges in the country's southwestern Rostov region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But Euronews international correspondent Annalise Borges in Kiev says Ukraine is playing down the threat posed by these maneuvers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Here in Ukraine, high-level politicians are putting on a brave face and toning down the threat posed by the current buildup of Russian troops on their border. The Foreign Affairs Minister here said that the current number of soldiers is insufficient for a full attack, and the country's president has repeatedly said that the situation is under control.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Support and solidarity continues to be amplified by NATO countries for Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Romania President Klaus Johannes stated on Wednesday afternoon that the country is ready to host NATO troops, underlining that NATO is only acting defensively.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, German Defence Minister Christine Lambrecht welcomed her British counterpart Ben Wallace for bilateral talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Here Lambrecht defended Germany's decision not to send lethal weapons to Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: While Wallace said he was not optimistic a Russian invasion could be prevented.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The German government has clearly agreed that we will not send any lethal weapons, no arms deliveries to crisis areas, because we do not want to fuel these conflicts even further. And I believe that this is also the right way in this case." While not delivering weapons, Germany will send 5,000 military helmets to Ukraine, following a request from the country's embassy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We can welcome the life we knew before the pandemic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen has told the people of Denmark as she announced the scrapping of nearly all the remaining COVID-19 restrictions in the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Tonight we can lower our shoulders, relax and start finding the right smile again.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: For tonight and today is a milestone.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: We can now remove the last coronavirus restrictions in Denmark." Low levels of Covid hospitalisations have prompted the move, though Omicron infection rates remain high.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: From February 1st, Danes will enjoy open access to restaurants, cafes, museums and nightclubs.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Mask wearing will not be mandatory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Austria too is relaxing its rules, announcing an end to the lockdown for unvaccinated residents.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Chancellor Karl Neuhammer said the measure was no longer needed because there was no longer a threat of hospital intensive care units being overstretched.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Omicron infections do continue to surge in many countries across Europe, however, with the Czech Republic and Poland among those to announce record number of daily cases.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But with the virus proving less deadly than in previous waves, 2022 for now remains optimistic across the continent.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: across the continent. The third round of voting by Italian lawmakers to elect the country's new president ended

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: inconclusively again on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Of 978 ballots cast, almost half were blank, say officials.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: Repeated failures between parties to agree on a viable candidate to replace President Sergio Mattarella means yet more intense negotiations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: There are strong differences between the centre-right and centre-left blocs on who should take up the role, even though that of the President is largely ceremonial.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But whoever is elected can be influential in navigating Italy's not-infrequent political crises.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: They also have the power to dissolve Parliament and approach any would-be Prime Minister to form a new coalition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Our correspondent says during the fourth count on Thursday we'll see if the majority forces have used the time to find agreement and if they're ready to come out with their candidates, because the names they've put forward so far have not led to consensus.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Also on Thursday, the necessary threshold for victory drops from two-thirds of votes to a straight 505.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The Duke of York is demanding a jury trial and denies that jeffrey epstein trafficked girls

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: to him in the virginia jeffrey sexual abuse lawsuit that's according to prince andrew's lawyers after filing papers on wednesday at the manhattan federal court the 61 year old denies any wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The Vatican has strongly defended Pope Benedict's record in fighting clergy sexual abuse and cautioned against looking for easy scapegoats and summary judgments.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: An independent report released last week faulted his handling of four cases of abuse when he was Archbishop of Munich.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: It's the first exhibition in London to focus on Francis Bacon's work since 2008.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The British artist was obsessed with the physicality of human and animal bodies, and in his paintings he made bleak, raw and emotional interpretations of humanity, just as World War II ended.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Bacon, throughout his life, throughout his career really, was fascinated by animals, but also by, let's say, the animalistic within us as humans.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: And he felt to some degree that there was only our civilisation, our manners, our way we behave with each other.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's just a very thin veneer overlaying what are essentially sort of animalistic instincts that we also have as human.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Bacon's talent was only fully realized in the horrifically animalistic paintings of people he produced just as the Nazi concentration camps were coming to light.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: I think there's a good spread of works by Bacon here, and we see that there's a lot of different phases of his life and some works I've never seen before and I've seen a lot of Francis Bacon works.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's great to see a lot of things that you wouldn't normally see in loans from the US that wouldn't normally leave those shores.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: So it's great to see such a wide variety of species.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Francis Bacon, Man and Beast will run from Friday until the 17th of April.
